abstract: Federal Trade Commission releases guide for so-called native advertising with goal of preventing customers from being deceived; guidelines, which outline for first time how advertisers and publishers should use these types of ads, are essentially warning to online ad industry.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission’s new rules lay out for the first time how advertisers and publishers should deploy and label native ads.

headline.main: F.T.C. Guidelines on Native Ads Aim to Prevent Deception
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Guidelines for Native Ads Aim to Prevent Deception

snippet: The Federal Trade Commission’s new rules lay out for the first time how advertisers and publishers should deploy and label native ads.
